minions.name: Azure Herald
minions.description: Opening Gambit: Add 3 Health to your General

minions.name: Blistering Skorn
minions.description: Opening Gambit: Deal 1 damage to everything (including itself)

minions.name: Celestial Phantom
minions.description: Destroy any enemy minion that Celestial Phantom attacks

minions.name: Flameblood Warlock
minions.description: Opening Gambit: Deal 3 damage to both generals

minions.name: Frostbone Naga
minions.description: Opening Gambit: Deal 2 damage to everything around it

minions.name: Piercing Mantis
minions.description: After attacking, deal 2 damage to all surrounding enemies

minions.name: Serpenti
minions.description: After attacking, deal 7 damage to all surrounding enemies

minions.name: Spectral Revenant
minions.description:
Rush 
 Whenever this minion attacks an enemy minion, deal 4 damage to the enemy General

minions.name: Sun Seer
minions.description: When this minion attacks,  your General gains 2 Health

minions.name: War Talon
minions.description: Provoke, After attacking, deal 4 damage to all surrounding enemies

spells.name: Frostburn
spells.description: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions

spells.name: Kinetic Equilibrium
spells.description: Deal 2 damage to ALL minions in a 3x3 area. Friendly minions in the area also gain +2 Attack

spells.name: Void Pulse
spells.description: Deal 2 damage to the enemy General. Your General gains 3 Health.
